name: Little-screens
tagline: Designing and Developing Mobile Apps. [CUNY City College Topics in Web Programming (Art 49552)]
body:
## Little Screens - Mobile App Development
The City College of New York, Fall 2014  
Topics in Web Programming, Art #49552  
Mondays, 6:15 â€“ 9:05pm  
Website: [littlescreens.justinblinder.com](http://littlescreens.justinblinder.com)  
Location: Compton Goethals Hall CG121  
Instructor: [Justin Blinder](mailto:justin.blinder@gmail.com)

## [Syllabus](https://github.com/jblinder/little-screens/wiki/Syllabus)

## Course Schedule
Week  | Date  | Topic 
------------- | ------------- | ------------- 
[Week 1](https://github.com/jblinder/little-screens/wiki/Week-1) | Sept. 8 | Overview, Developer Tools, Git
[Week 2](https://github.com/jblinder/little-screens/wiki/Week-2) | Sept. 15 | Introduction to Mobile Web Applications
[Week 3](https://github.com/jblinder/little-screens/wiki/Week-3) | Sept. 22 | HTML5 Features
[Week 4](https://github.com/jblinder/little-screens/wiki/Week-4) | Sept. 29 | jQuery and API Web services
[Week 5](https://github.com/jblinder/little-screens/wiki/Week-5) | Oct. 6 | Mobile UI using jQuery Mobile
:x:  | Oct. 13 | No classes! :balloon: 
[Week 6](https://github.com/jblinder/little-screens/wiki/Week-6) | Oct. 20 | jQuery Mobile Extended
[Week 7](https://github.com/jblinder/little-screens/wiki/Week-7) | Oct. 27 | Midterm Review & Transitioning to Native Apps
[Week 8](https://github.com/jblinder/little-screens/wiki/Week-8) | Nov. 3 | Introduction to Cordova and PhoneGap
[Week 9](https://github.com/jblinder/little-screens/wiki/Week-9) | Nov. 10 | Cordova Setup
[Week 10](https://github.com/jblinder/little-screens/wiki/Week-%E2%80%A210) | Nov. 17 | Cordova Features
[Week 11](https://github.com/jblinder/little-screens/wiki/Week-%E2%80%A211) | Nov. 24 | Phongap + jQuery Mobile
Week 12 | Dec. 1 | In-class work session
Week 13 | Dec. 8 | In-class work session
Week 14 | Dec. 15 | Final presentations and critiques :tada:
